references: Related: CF 210256, Ord 76621, Ord 77781. Amending: Ord 76621
summary: An ordinance relating to the installation of traffic signals and the channelization of certain intersections; revising the number of signals and channelized intersections under authority of Ordinance No. 76621, reducing the appropriation therefor and amending Sections 1 and 3 of Ordinance No. 76621 as amended by Ordinance No. 77781.
